result.name: dover-to-deal-marine-conservation-zone-mcz-survey-data
result.notes:
One survey of Dover to Deal rMCZ site have been completed to date (Apr 2015):

Cruise: EA_svgl0812

Date: 11th March - 14th March 2012

Data collected:

MB Bathymetry Coverage (Contractor): 100% Coverage (CHP)

MB Backscatter Coverage (Contractor): 100% Coverage (CHP)

SS Coverage: None acquired to date

Video and Stills Samples to date: 22 video transects; 237 stills analysed - 
Usable

PSA Samples to date: 9

Infauna Samples to date: 9

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network

organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
